options.name: Simple File Upload Example
options.notes:
To add automated emails in stage 4  :
1) add a new default email template
( see the templates tab for this (requires PRO) ).
2) edit the new email template's message field and change the  [wtf_fu_show_files] shortcode to match the upload directory attributes.
e.g. [wtf_fu_show_files wtf_upload_dir="demofiles" wtf_upload_subdir="images" email_format="1"]
3) edit stage 4 of this workflow and select this new email template you created in the send_email field.
options.description:
Simple Upload Workflow
0) Introduction.
1) Upload some image files.
2) Display and re-order the images.
3) Upload some music files.
4) Review files and submit + automated email.
5) Thank-you.
6) Complete.

options.content_area:
You will be automatically asked to upload some files for our attention. This will involve the following steps.

  1. Upload up to 10 image files.
  2. Arrange your images in your order of preference.
  3. Upload up to 3 music files.
  4. Review your uploaded files and submit to us for processing.
  5. Receive confirmation of your submission.
  6. Completion.

After you have submitted your files you will be sent a confirmation email.

Press the 'Start' button below to get started now.
options.footer: Click 'start' above to begin. You may return to this stage later by using the back button.

options.header: In this step you may upload some images.
options.content_area:
Add files by dragging and dropping files to this page, or using the 'add files' button.

The following restrictions are in place :

  1. Files must be of the type jpg, jpeg, png, or gif.
  2. The maximum size for uploaded files is restricted to 2 mb.
  3. A Maximum of 20 files may be uploaded.

[wtf_fu_upload wtf_upload_dir=demofiles wtf_upload_subdir=images accept_file_types=jpg|jpeg|png|gif max_file_size=2 max_number_of_files=20]
options.footer: Click 'Next' once you are finished uploading your files. You will be able to return to here to upload more files at a later stage if you wish.

options.header: In this step you can rearrange your files to your preferred order.
options.content_area:
Drag your files with the mouse into the order you want them.

 

[wtf_fu_show_files wtf_upload_dir=demofiles wtf_upload_subdir=images reorder=1]
options.footer: In the next step you can upload some music files.

options.header: In this step you can upload some music files.
options.content_area:
Drag and drop your music file below.

Add files by dragging and dropping files to this page, or using the 'add files' button.

The following restrictions are in place :

  1. Files must be of the type mp3, wav, or ogg.
  2. The maximum size for uploaded files is restricted to 5mb.
  3. A Maximum of 3 files may be uploaded.

[wtf_fu_upload wtf_upload_dir=demofiles  wtf_upload_subdir=music accept_file_types=mp3|wav|ogg max_file_size=5 max_number_of_files=3]

options.header: In this step you can review your files before submitting them.
options.content_area:
Please check that all your files are present and ordered correctly, if not please use the back button to make changes as required.

You can view your images full size in a gallery display by clicking one of them.

Your image files : [wtf_fu_show_files wtf_upload_dir="demofiles" wtf_upload_subdir="images"]

Your music files : [wtf_fu_show_files wtf_upload_dir=demofiles wtf_upload_subdir=music vertical=1]
If everything looks good press Submit now to continue.
options.footer: Click Submit' to submit once everything is correct. ( You will not be able to return to this step once you have submitted your files. )
options.next_js: onClick="return confirm('Are you ready to submit your files ?');"

options.header: Your files have been submitted. You should shortly receive an email
options.content_area:
You should shortly receive a confirmation email containing a thumbnail listing of the files you submitted to us.

Once we have done some stuff with your files you will be notified. After that you will then be enabled to proceed onto the next step where you can review what we have done and download the finished product.
options.footer: Your order is being processed. Once that is completed you will be notified and then be able to come back and proceed onto the next stage.

options.content_area:
If you enjoyed our service please tell all your friends about us .

If you didn't, please try to keep your mouth shut :).

You submitted the following files :

Images : [wtf_fu_show_files wtf_upload_dir="demofiles" wtf_upload_subdir="images"]

 

Music : [wtf_fu_show_files wtf_upload_dir="demofiles" wtf_upload_subdir="music"]

Hope you had fun with this demo :)

If you have any questions feel free to email %%ADMIN_NAME%% at %%ADMIN_EMAIL%%
options.footer: You have now completed this demo and cannot go back to previous stages. Please contact %%ADMIN_EMAIL%% if you need to go back to a previous stage.
